item.title:
So much pink paint was used on the set of Greta Gerwig’s ‘BARBIE’ that it caused an international shortage, according to production designer Sarah Greenwood.
“The world ran out of pink.”
(https://architecturaldigest.com/story/inside-the-barbie-dreamhouse-a-fuchsia-fantasy-inspired-by-palm-springs/amp…)

item.title:
Oscar Isaac says ‘RUPAUL’S DRAG RACE’ is his comfort show.
“It's really comforting. I haven't gotten into the new All-Stars season because I'm still on the last one and I've got three left.”
(https://gq-magazine.co.uk/article/oscar-isaac-spider-man-across-the-spider-verse-interview…)
